items.headline: Strategist who said passive investing is ‘worse than Marxism’ says AI plays are only making the problem worse
items.summary_en: A Wall Street strategist who made a splash a decade ago with a report arguing that the rise of passive investing was “worse than Marxism” has said the problem is even bigger than he initially realized.
